info.title: Debit Memo Request (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:
 - You can read entire debit memo requests or only parts of the data, using the provided filters.
 - You can create debit memo requests. Note that you must use “deep insert” requests (a header plus the following entities: header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text). You cannot create entities without including any related entities.
 - For existing debit memo requests, you can create new items. Note that you must use “deep insert” requests (with the following entities: item partner, item pricing element, and item text). You cannot create entities without including any related entities.
 - For existing debit memo requests, you can update the following entities (that is, you can change the content of their properties): header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.
 - For existing debit memo requests, you can delete the header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.
 - You can accept or deny approval requests for debit memo requests that cannot be processed without the consent of an approver.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete debit memo requests with this synchronous OData API

values.text: [Invoice Correction Process with Debit Memo(BDQ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/BDQ " Link To BP ")
[Invoice Correction Process with Debit Memo(ODQ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/ODQ " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Sales Document (SD_SALESDOC)
* Sales: Sales Document Item (SD_SALESDOCITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads the subsequent items of all debit memo requests items.
get.description: Reads the process flow data for all debit memo request items and their subsequent items in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: DebitMemoRequestItem
parameters.description: Preceding Item of an SD Document

get.summary: Reads a subsequent item for a debit memo request item.
get.description: Reads the process flow data of a specific subsequent item of a specific debit memo request item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, debit memo request item ID, and document relationship UUID.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: DebitMemoRequestItem
parameters.description: Preceding Item of an SD Document

get.description: Reads the debit memo request header data for a specific subsequent item of a debit memo request item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, debit memo request item number, and document relationship UUID.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.description: Preceding Item of an SD Document

post.description: Creates a debit memo request header using deep insert requests. This means consumers can create a debit memo request with all possible sub-entities (for example, header partners or items).

get.description: Reads the header data of a specific debit memo request. Consumers must pass the debit memo request ID (key field).

delete.description: Deletes the data of a specific debit memo request item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID and item number.

get.summary: Reads the debit memo request header for a specific item.
get.description: Reads the debit memo request header data for a specific item. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID and item number.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the subsequent items of specified debit memo request items.
get.description: Reads the process flow data of specific subsequent items of specific debit memo request items. Consumers must pass the following key fields: debit memo request ID, debit memo request item ID

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_DbtMemoReqItmSubsqntProcFlow HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
